caption.p: Predicted distribution of Shorea robusta species for three global climate models ( GCMs): (a) current distribution and suitability; (b, c) scenarios for CGM 1; (d, e) scenarios for GCM 2; and (f, g) scenarios for GCM 3. Modeling results suggest that climatically suitable habitat conditions for Sal will decline by 2070, with an average of 24% and 34% (the mean of three GCMs) under RCP4.5 and RCP8.5, respectively
